title: Tadej Poga훾ar lands big psychological blow with Puy de Dome gains
content:
Mind games continue between UAE-Team Emirates and Jumbo-Visma as Poga훾ar whittles deficit down to 17 seconds after 'small victory'.

Read the full article at Tadej Poga훾ar lands big psychological blow with Puy de Dome gains on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
